pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.dao

Class ContactFormMessageDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.dao.ContactFormMessageDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContactFormMessageDao

    @Repository
public class ContactFormMessageDaoImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContactFormMessageDao
    Repository class for performing database operations on ContactFormMessage and Comment objects.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur
